infos.first: A multitude of aluminum rims, for a multitude of vehicles. Aggression, Stability and Elegance, make these 3 words your motto.

firstBlog.1: Welcome to WHEELART.FR, where passion for automobiles meets technical expertise! Established in
firstBlog.2: (Essonne) since 2020, our team responds to the growing demand for aluminum rims in ÃŽle-de-France. We are committed to providing a personalized, fast and efficient shopping experience, offering a full range of quality tires for different driving styles.

about.secondBlog: With a strong automotive culture and extensive business experience, we provide products and services with the best value for money. Discover different rim sizes (from 17 to 22 inches) and a variety of colors to match your preferences. For specific requests, contact us directly by phone or via the 'contact' section.
about.threeBlog: Visit our showroom for a seamless experience, including assembly services. Purchase products and perform on-site assembly and balancing. To suit all budgets, we offer payment facilities in 3 or 4 installments.  The Wheel Art team looks forward to welcoming you!
